<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/api/v1/workspaces/{slug}/projects/{project_id}/issues/{pk}/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Partially update an existing work item with the provided fields. Supports external ID validation to prevent conflicts.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
